name: 页面引导系统查询模板字典
description: 页面引导、页面引导章节、页面描述等页面引导系统相关表的查询模板

页面引导总数.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM page_guides

活跃页面引导.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM page_guides WHERE is_active = 1
活跃页面引导.description: 查询活跃页面引导数量

页面引导分类统计.sql: SELECT category, COUNT(*) as count FROM page_guides GROUP BY category ORDER BY count DESC
页面引导分类统计.description: 统计页面引导分类分布
页面引导分类统计.response: 页面引导分类统计完成

页面引导重要性分析.sql: SELECT importance, COUNT(*) as count FROM page_guides GROUP BY importance ORDER BY importance DESC
页面引导重要性分析.description: 分析页面引导重要性分布
页面引导重要性分析.response: 页面引导重要性分析完成

高重要性页面引导.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM page_guides WHERE importance >= 8 AND is_active = 1
高重要性页面引导.description: 查询高重要性页面引导数量

本月新增页面引导.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM page_guides WHERE YEAR(created_at) = YEAR(NOW()) AND MONTH(created_at) = MONTH(NOW())
本月新增页面引导.description: 查询本月新增页面引导数量

页面引导关联表统计.sql: SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN related_tables IS NOT NULL AND JSON_LENGTH(related_tables) > 0 THEN 1 END) as with_tables, COUNT(*) as total_guides FROM page_guides
页面引导关联表统计.description: 统计关联数据表的页面引导
页面引导关联表统计.response: 页面引导关联表统计完成

页面引导章节总数.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM page_guide_sections
页面引导章节总数.description: 查询页面引导章节总数
页面引导章节总数.response: 页面引导章节总数为{count}个

活跃引导章节.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM page_guide_sections WHERE is_active = 1
活跃引导章节.description: 查询活跃引导章节数量

页面章节分布统计.sql: SELECT pg.page_name, COUNT(pgs.id) as section_count FROM page_guides pg LEFT JOIN page_guide_sections pgs ON pg.id = pgs.page_guide_id WHERE pg.is_active = 1 GROUP BY pg.id, pg.page_name ORDER BY section_count DESC
页面章节分布统计.description: 统计各页面的章节数量分布
页面章节分布统计.response: 页面章节分布统计完成

章节功能特性统计.sql: SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN features IS NOT NULL AND JSON_LENGTH(features) > 0 THEN 1 END) as with_features, COUNT(*) as total_sections FROM page_guide_sections
章节功能特性统计.description: 统计包含功能特性的章节
章节功能特性统计.response: 章节功能特性统计完成

本月新增章节.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM page_guide_sections WHERE YEAR(created_at) = YEAR(NOW()) AND MONTH(created_at) = MONTH(NOW())
本月新增章节.description: 查询本月新增章节数量

章节排序分析.sql: SELECT AVG(sort_order) as avg_order, MIN(sort_order) as min_order, MAX(sort_order) as max_order FROM page_guide_sections WHERE is_active = 1

页面描述总数.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM page_descriptions

页面描述功能统计.sql: SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN features IS NOT NULL AND JSON_LENGTH(features) > 0 THEN 1 END) as with_features, COUNT(*) as total_descriptions FROM page_descriptions
页面描述功能统计.description: 统计包含功能描述的页面
页面描述功能统计.response: 页面描述功能统计完成

页面帮助内容统计.sql: SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN help_content IS NOT NULL AND JSON_LENGTH(help_content) > 0 THEN 1 END) as with_help, COUNT(*) as total_descriptions FROM page_descriptions
页面帮助内容统计.description: 统计包含帮助内容的页面
页面帮助内容统计.response: 页面帮助内容统计完成

本月更新页面描述.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM page_descriptions WHERE YEAR(updated_at) = YEAR(NOW()) AND MONTH(updated_at) = MONTH(NOW())
本月更新页面描述.description: 查询本月更新的页面描述数量

页面引导系统概览.sql: SELECT 'page_guides' as category, COUNT(*) as count FROM page_guides UNION ALL SELECT 'page_guide_sections' as category, COUNT(*) as count FROM page_guide_sections UNION ALL SELECT 'page_descriptions' as category, COUNT(*) as count FROM page_descriptions
页面引导系统概览.description: 页面引导系统数据总览
页面引导系统概览.response: 页面引导系统概览查询完成

页面引导完整性分析.sql: SELECT pg.category, COUNT(pg.id) as guide_count, COUNT(pgs.id) as section_count FROM page_guides pg LEFT JOIN page_guide_sections pgs ON pg.id = pgs.page_guide_id WHERE pg.is_active = 1 GROUP BY pg.category ORDER BY guide_count DESC
页面引导完整性分析.response: 页面引导完整性分析完成

引导系统活跃度统计.sql: SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN pg.is_active = 1 THEN 1 END) as active_guides, COUNT(CASE WHEN pgs.is_active = 1 THEN 1 END) as active_sections FROM page_guides pg, page_guide_sections pgs
引导系统活跃度统计.response: 引导系统活跃度统计完成
